Package graph

Class AbstractUndirectedWeightedGraph<V>

java.lang.Object
graph.AbstractUndirectedWeightedGraph<V>
All Implemented Interfaces:
WeightedGraph<V>
Direct Known Subclasses:
DenseUndirectedWeightedGraph, SpanningTree
public abstract class AbstractUndirectedWeightedGraph<V>
extends java.lang.Object
implements WeightedGraph<V>
This class is a Weighted graph abstraction.
